main event: Radar operators in Philadelphia reported unidentified objects on their screens which disappeared, and there were multiple eyewitness accounts of bright objects in the sky.
interesting points: The radar tracked objects moving at over 200 mph,One object was described as shiny and metallic,One witness reported four large, round, bright objects traveling in a tight formation,The sightings involved multiple witnesses including civilians and military personnel,There were comments suggesting some objects may have been confused with balloons.
witness description: Civilians, including an astronomy enthusiast and a veteran of World War II.
